title: The 2022 Oscar Predictions: Who Will Win and Who Should
description:
It’s almost time for the 94th annual Academy Awards, so Sean and Joanna Robinson are making picks in all 23 categories. Don’t fill out your Oscar ballot until you’ve listened.

Host: Sean Fennessey
Guest: Joanna Robinson
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
